meanings.sent1: After being sick for a week, he felt debilitated and tired.
meanings.sent2: The debilitated old dog struggled to climb the stairs.
meanings.sent3: The debilitated phone battery gave up just when he needed it the most.
meanings.sent4: Her debilitated confidence was like a fragile glass ready to shatter.
meanings.sent5: The debilitated plant wilted under the scorching sun.

meanings.sent1: The debilitated kitten could barely meow due to its illness.
meanings.sent2: The debilitated patient needed assistance to walk to the bathroom.
meanings.sent3: The debilitated umbrella flipped inside out in a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: His debilitated resolve crumbled under the weight of disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The debilitated bridge creaked under the weight of the heavy truck.

meanings.sent1: The debilitated plant withered away without proper sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The debilitated economy struggled to recover from the recession.
meanings.sent3: The debilitated toy robot moved in slow, jerky motions.
meanings.sent4: Her debilitated spirit brightened up after hearing the good news.
meanings.sent5: The debilitated athlete could barely finish the race.
